entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
